foreignData.name: Lauernder Skirg
foreignData.text: Wenn eine Kreatur auf den Friedhof eines Deiner Gegner gelegt wird und der Lauernde Skirg eine Verzauberung ist, wird der Lauernde Skirg zu einer 3/2 fliegenden Kreatur, die als Bold zählt.

name: Lurking Skirge
originalText: When a creature is put into one of your opponents' graveyards, if Lurking Skirge is an enchantment, Lurking Skirge becomes a 3/2 creature with flying that counts as an Imp.

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

text: When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if Lurking Skirge is an enchantment, Lurking Skirge becomes a 3/2 Phyrexian Imp creature with flying.
